name: Raisin Squares
author: Janice Casselman
summary: This recipe has been in our family for years. It is a Christmas tradition.
ingredients: ½ cup pitted sour cherries, drained with liquid reserved
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, mix together 1/2 cup of brown sugar, butter, 1/2 cup of flour and oats until crumbly
Press into the bottom of a 9 inch square pan
Bake for 15 minutes in the preheated oven
In the same bowl, mix together the eggs, 1 cup of brown sugar, 1/2 cup flour, salt, baking powder and vanilla until well blended
Stir in the raisins, coconut and cherries, adding a little bit of the cherry juice to keep it from becoming stiff
Spread over the baked crust in the pan
Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until firm and lightly browned
